subject: Breeders' Cup (Horse Races)
Horse Racing
Doping (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The ban on furosemide, a diuretic sold under the name Lasix or Salix, has been met with resistance, leading to smaller fields in Breeders’ Cup races.
snippet: The ban on furosemide, a diuretic sold under the name Lasix or Salix, has been met with resistance, leading to smaller fields in Breeders’ Cup races.
